I had like 7 Hours on this before the Resident evil expansion, theres something to be said about running around as Res evil characters in this game and chasing people around as Nemesis and whipping them with your tentacle like appendage *Chefs kiss* Since the res evil drop i now have 86 Hours so thanks for the expansion creators need more colabs like this looking forward to enjoying more.
if you have a pc or desktop on more of the cheaper side be careful because it can freeze up a glitch but it may just be your wifi as well

Ta weno compralo

First 100 hours are pretty fun, horror elements really shine when starting fresh. Anything after that and the poor matchmaking, meta of builds and garbage high rank gameplay sorta makes the game stale. Only thing fun post 1k hours is 4man games and meme builds.
this is a must try for asymmetrical game and horror fans
tiene muchas cosas para leer re denso como contra, a favor, no hace falta leer para entender el juego.

Let this serve as a warning to anyone who thinks they will be ok if they just buy the base game.

You may think that if you buy the game, you will have everything you need to have fair competition against your opponents. This will rapidly stop being the case. When you are brand new, you will be playing against mostly other new players so it won't be too bad, but after you rank up a few times you will start running into some survivors who have all the DLCs and the perks that come with them. Their builds will be objectively better than yours and you will be at a noticeable disadvantage because of it. At first it's just every couple players, but before long you're the only one in most of your games that isn't running perks from 3 different DLCs for the most meta build. A truly great player can certainly overcome the disadvantages, but the point is having the DLC is basically pay to win. Your win rate will rise just by purchasing the DLC, and if you don't you will eventually find yourself in ELO hell where you're unable to rank up because the competition is too good and playing with an advantage, but deliberately ranking down is generally considered bad manner so you're just stuck getting dunked on every other game by sheer virtue of being outspent by other players. Oh and the cosmetics are like $20. 

Beyond that, the matchmaking is pretty terrible. You'll spend nearly as much time looking for a match and loading as you will actually playing the game, and when you finally do find a match there's a good chance it will be poorly balanced. 90% of the time at least 2 of the 4 other players in the lobby will be at least a few ranks higher or lower than you.

And the straw that broke this camels back and lead to my first refund on over 100 games, there are cheaters. In a ranked only game that has been out for 5 years. My last match I had 3 survivors hooked in the basement with 3 gens left when I was suddenly disconnected despite my internet being fine. I lost ranks for that and the cheater got a nice disconnect bonus for me. Luckily steam support is pretty understanding and realizes players deserve a better experience than not being able to play killers that are prominently advertised on the base game steam page, having to grind an unreasonable amount to earn just one of the killers you are actually allowed to buy without spending more money just to spend 1/3 of their playtime waiting to find a game so they can play against more skilled opponents who have superior builds that just cheat when you finally manage to outplay them.
amazing game, some bugs but overall super fun ti play with friends
Es un excelente en el cual te divertes muchisimo.
Fun game. Not balanced whatsoever though. Can still have a good time nonetheless.

I you like watching classic horror movies, and playing games where you either run for your life or make others run for their lives, this game is for you. I got it 2 years ago on PS plus and it has always been loads of fun to me.

I would full heartly recommned to buy this 2 down sides is long wait time for games but if you have 4 friends to play with you goes quick. Another downside is seems there should be for free killers and players only get some of the DLC's if there on sale other wise a waste of time. Also there should be a another way of getting bloodpoints.
My favorite gaem to play with friends
I'd rather castrate myself with a butter knife than play more than 3 rounds of this game
cool game, but so many afk killers it ruins the fun

Als Surv ist es jedoch auch nicht unbedingt einfacher, gerade in der SoloQ ... Spielt man mit Friends, sieht die Sache dann schon ganz anders aus. Da kÃ¶nnt ihr teilweise (je nach Erfahrung!!) die Killer so richtig zerlegen.
